name: stockbroking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the job or activity of buying and selling stocks and shares for other people: Banks began to widen the range of services they offered to include stockbroking, merchant banking, and insurance. Merrill Lynch is one of America's leading stockbroking firms. See
stockbroker
More examplesFewer examplesHilary entered stockbroking after an academic career.Online stockbroking is one of the Internet's big success stories.He is building a team dedicated to what he calls "good old-fashioned stockbroking."

the business of buying and selling shares, bonds, etc. for other people and organizations: a stockbroking company/firm/service Online stockbroking services introduced large numbers of people to share trading.
